sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Navbar, Container, Nav, Card, ListGroup, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap';



function CustomerViewPro({productimage,productname,productprice}) {
    return (
        <>
           
            <Navbar bg="primary" variant="dark">
                <Container>
                    <Navbar.Brand >View Order</Navbar.Brand>
                    {/* <Nav className="me-auto">
                        <Link to="/admin" style={{ color: 'white' }}>Admin page</Link>

                    </Nav> */}
                </Container>
            </Navbar>

            <Card style={{ width: '18rem' }}>
                <Card.Img variant="top" src={productimage} />
                <Card.Body>
                    <Card.Title>{productname}</Card.Title>
                    
                </Card.Body>
                <ListGroup className="list-group-flush">
                    <ListGroupItem>{productprice}</ListGroupItem>
                    
                </ListGroup>
                {/* <Card.Body>
                    <Card.Link href="#">Card Link</Card.Link>
                    <Card.Link href="#">Another Link</Card.Link>
                </Card.Body> */}
            </Card>
        </>
    )
}

export default CustomerViewPro
